content.raw:
I got the camera info to work on RViz:

![camera_info.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/da5rgr4/images/352655300-camera_info.png)

Using:

* this PR
* #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-msgs/pull-requests/136/blueprint-camera-info/diff
* https://github.com/osrf/ros1_ign_bridge/pull/15

The camera pose is rotated by 90 degrees though. That pink box shouldn't be visible at that pose. I think the problem is in this PR somewhere. Looking into it.
content.html:
I got the camera info to work on RViz:

Using:

  • this PR
  • #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-msgs/pull-requests/136/blueprint-camera-info/diff
  • https://github.com/osrf/ros1_ign_bridge/pull/15

The camera pose is rotated by 90 degrees though. That pink box shouldn't be visible at that pose. I think the problem is in this PR somewhere. Looking into it.
